title: How to Build in Web3
summary: This is a technical course for Builders who look to build in Web3 space.
details:
In this course we cover the following
1) Chapter 1 - Information about various smart contracts of AAVE
2) Chapter 2 - How to pull data from Aave which can be used to create analytics applications
3) Chapter 3 - How to setup a developer environment to interact with Aave's smart contracts
4) Chapter 4 - Interacting with Aave's Smart Contracts
highlights: Writing simple UI application on top of AAVE

topics.title: AAVE Smart Contracts
topics.details: This chapter taks about various important smart contracts of AAVE which forms the basis of lending and borrowing
